Module com.group25
Package com.group25

Class Outfit

java.lang.Object
com.group25.Outfit
public class Outfit extends Object
Represents an outfit with components such as hat, face, and shirt.
Author:
Adam Murdock Gale, Sameer Mehboob Bugti, Saad Meshaal Koker, Jesse Titus, Fahmid Abdullah

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Outfit()
    Constructs an outfit with default values for hat, face, and shirt.
    Outfit(int hat, int face, int shirt)
    Constructs an outfit with specified values for hat, face, and shirt.
